message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. Your turn!
I'll give you a slightly better deal, Alice. Your turn to decide!
Not bad, Bob, but I was hoping for a better deal. I'll reject this offer and make a counteroffer in the next round!
I'm willing to compromise, Bob. This offer is a bit more in my favor, but I'm still open to negotiations!
I'll give you a bit more, Alice. I'm willing to meet in the middle. Your turn to decide!
Alright, Bob, I think we've reached a good compromise. I accept your offer of a 65-35 split. Let's split the $100!
